actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-88.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-88) Directs that the expenses of studies and investigations to be conducted by the House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs, not to exceed $2,613,590, be paid out of the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
